Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2011 03:56AM jenlong wrote: I was 38 years old when diagnosed and had stage I. I also had 100% ER/PR. I never had an option. I mean from the beginning all the docs said that I needed chemo. Pretty much cause of my age I guess. Was supposed to have 6x FEC, but after the 3rd refused chemo unless I could switch to CMF (was scared of heart problems). They agreed. I'm overseas and really surprised to read that I probably wouldn't have gotten chemo if I was in the states... Peace, Jen
Posts.Title: If you were stage I, did you get chemo??? mdg SusansGarden
